document.full_text: iraq's military is preparing an assessment that may acknowledge gaps in the country's security forces, according to two sources familiar with the matter, a move that could bolster arguments to extend the u.s. military presence in iraq.
document.title: iraqi forces eye readiness ahead of u.s. pullout
lines_and_colors: iraq's military is preparing an assessment that may acknowledge gaps in the country's security forces, according to two sources familiar with the matter, a move that could bolster arguments to extend the u.s. military presence in iraq.
